name: kraksnax (c64)
description:
New stuff will posted here. Follow and enjoy.All artwork conveniently disk in executable d64 and can be loaded from any C64 device, emulator or computer and is exclusive first release on this itch.io page. C64 fans will definitely want to check out these amazing pieces of software.

Note from krakboy:

"All artwork is optimally designed for real Commodore 64 hardware, or emulators using the CRT TV/Monitor Filter. I recommend to switch to CRT mode as it does emulate the actual true experience for majority of games and art of system and displays de best. I have used VICE for many years, and in the 80s I was lucky enough to have a very crisp RGB TV/Monitor that CRT still represents (and if you can adjust - all the butter). But still, I've come to the conclusion that CRT is the only way to go, and it's just unnatural otherwise."

  • All programs files are NTSC/PAL approved unless otherwise noted.

DA LIST

001 Paradroid - 35th Anniversary Ed.
